validate((uint256,uint256)[]).details: Reverts with TaskTwo_RulesViolated if any date pair violates the rule

params.dates: An array of DateObj structs containing expiry and disbursed dates

TaskTwo_RulesViolated().notice: Error thrown when the expiry date is not more than 6 months after the disbursed date

validate((uint256,uint256)[]).notice: Validates that the expiry date is more than 6 months after the disbursed date for each item
